Record numbers (Sea/Ocean classification): Atlantic Ocean: 2 , Caribbean Sea: 1 , Coral Sea: 1 , Indian Ocean: 1 , Ionian Sea: 2 , Pacific Ocean: 3 , Tasman Sea: 2 ;
total: 12 .

Record numbers (FAO classification): FAO 31 : 2 , FAO 37 : 2 , FAO 41 : 1 , FAO 51 : 1 , FAO 57 : 2 , FAO 71 : 1 , FAO 77 : 2 , FAO 87 : 1 ;
total: 12 .

Remarks: This species has a global distribution but is rather rare and known only from isolated sites down to ca. 100 m bsl (but most often from 0 to 20 m bsl). It has usually been found in different types of sand but occasionally also on algae growing on barnacles.
